src_original: prāsādasthas tu yo bhuktvā samudrānte pibej  jalaṃ |
api dāsakule jātaḥ so'pi rājā bhavi ( ṣyati ) ||8 ||
kanyā ( ṃ )
mānuṣāṇi ( ca )  māṃsāni svapnānte yas tu bhakṣayet |
pāde pañcaśataṃ ( lābhaḥ )  sahasraṃ bāhubhakṣaṇe ||10 ||
svapnādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi bṛhaspativinirmitaṃ |  yena vijñāyate puṃsāṃ svapneṣu ca śubhāśubhaṃ ||1 ||
śiraso bhakṣaṇe rājyaṃ labhate puṇyavigrahaḥ |  bahukoṭīśvaro cāpi kadā cij jāyate pumān ||11 ||
astrair veṣṭayate yas tu gṛhaṃ vā nagarāṇi ca |
gṛhe maṇḍalarājyaṃ vā nagare pārthivo  bhavet ||12 ||
upānahau ca cchattraṃ ca labdhvā yaḥ  pratibudhyati |  asiṃ ca nirmalaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tasya śrīs
naukārūḍho vipannaḥ syāt tato'pi ca samuttaret |
pravāsaṃ nirdiśet tasya śīghraṃ ca punar āgamaṃ ||14 ||
rohayet |
tasya vinirdiśet ||18 ||
raktāmbaradharāṃ nārīṃ raktagandhānulepitāṃ |
svapnas tu prathame (  yāme )  samvatsaraphalapradaḥ |
śuklāmbaradharāṃ nārīṃ śuklagandhānulepitāṃ |  avagūhati yaḥ svapne tasya śrī ( ḥ )
sarvatomukhī ||20 ||
abhidravanti yaṃ svapne śṛṅgiṇo daṃṣṭriṇo'pi vā  vānaro vā ( va )  rāho ( vā )
bhaved rājakulād bhayaṃ ||22 ||
ādityamaṇḍalaṃ svapne candraṃ vā yadi paśyati |
Svapnādhyāya  namo buddhāya ||
nigaḍair badhyate yas tu bāhupāśena vā punaḥ |
tgt_original: རྒོད་མ་ཁྱིམ་བྱ་ཀྲ་ཨཽཉཙི་༎ ཐོབ་ནས་གང་གི་གཉིད་སད་ན་༎ དེ་ཡིས་དེ་དུས་སྙིང་སྡུག་འཐོབ་༎ ཆུང་མ་ཉེ་དུ་སྨྲ་བ་ཅན་༎ གང་གིས་བཟུང་ནས་བཅིངས་པ་དང་༎ ཡང་ན་ལག་པ་ཞགས་པས་བཏབ་༎

src_original: putro vā jāyate tasya pratiṣṭhā vāpi  nirdiśyet ||24 ||
dvitīye tv aṣṭabhir māsai ( r māsais tri )  bhis tṛtīyake ||2 ||
raktaṃ pibati yaḥ svapne surām vāpi kathañcana |
brāḥmaṇo labhate vidhyām itaro labhate dhanaṃ ||26 ||
yaḥ svapne saphenaṃ dohinīgataṃ |  somapānaṃ bhavet tasya anyāṃ vā bhūtim
caturbhis tu caturthe syāt phalaṃ suniyataṃ nṛṇāṃ |
aruṇodayavelāyāṃ daśāhena phalaṃ bhavet ||3 ||
yas tu paśyati svapnānte rājānaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ |  suvarṇaṃ govṛṣaṃ gāṃ ca kuṭumbaṃ tasya
kṣīriṇaṃ phalinaṃ vṛkṣa ( m e )
tatrasthaś ca vibhudhyeta dhanaṃ śīghram  avāpnuyāt ||7 ||
